com.google.appinventor.components.annotations

Annotation Type DesignerComponent


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface DesignerComponent
    Annotation to mark components for use in the Designer and Blocks Editor.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      int version
      The version of the component.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      ComponentCategory category
      Category within designer.
      String description
      If non-empty, description to use in user-level documentation on a static web page in place of Javadoc, which is meant for developers.
      String designerHelpDescription
      Description to be shown on user request in the Designer.
      String iconName
      The file name of the icon that represents the component in the palette.
      boolean nonVisible
      If true, component is "non-visible" in the UI; that is, it doesn't need any special handling in the Designer and can be represented by a MockNonVisibleComponent.
      boolean showOnPalette
      If False, don't show this component on the palette.

    • Element Detail

      • version

        public abstract int version
        The version of the component.

      • category

        public abstract ComponentCategory category
        Category within designer.
        Default:
        com.google.appinventor.components.common.ComponentCategory.UNINITIALIZED

      • description

        public abstract String description
        If non-empty, description to use in user-level documentation on a static web page in place of Javadoc, which is meant for developers. This may contain unescaped HTML.
        Default:
        ""

      • designerHelpDescription

        public abstract String designerHelpDescription
        Description to be shown on user request in the Designer. If this field is empty, the description() field should be used. This may contain HTML. Internal double-quotes will be converted to single-quotes when this field is displayed in the designer. For now, this cannot contain an ampersand (%), which would corrupt ya_lang_def.xml.
        Default:
        ""

      • showOnPalette

        public abstract boolean showOnPalette
        If False, don't show this component on the palette. This was added to support the Form/Screen component.
        Default:
        true

      • nonVisible

        public abstract boolean nonVisible
        If true, component is "non-visible" in the UI; that is, it doesn't need any special handling in the Designer and can be represented by a MockNonVisibleComponent.
        Default:
        false

      • iconName

        public abstract String iconName
        The file name of the icon that represents the component in the palette. This should be just the last part of the path name for the file. We'll look for the file in "com/google/appinventor/images/" for statically loaded resources, or in "war/images/" for dynamically loaded components
        Returns:
        The name of the icon file
        Default:
        ""
